  • public class ArrayType
extends ReferenceType
    A (mono-dimensional) array type of the Kitten language.
    Author:
    Fausto Spoto

      • toString

      • canBeAssignedTo

        public boolean canBeAssignedTo(Type other)
        Determines whether this array type can be assigned to a given type. An array type can be assigned to another array type provided their elements types are the same, or rather those of other are supertypes of those of this. Note that if the elements are primitive types, they must be the same type. We also allow every array to be assigned to Object.
        Specified by:
        canBeAssignedTo in class Type
        Parameters:
        other - what this type should be assigned to
        Returns:
        true if the assignment is possible, false otherwise

      • leastCommonSupertype

        public Type leastCommonSupertype(Type other)
        Computes the least common supertype of a given type and this array type. That is, a common supertype which is the least amongst all possible supertypes.
        • If other is a class type, then class type Object is returned;
        • Otherwise, if [@code Object} is an array of primitive types and this is not the same array type, then Object is returned;
        • Otherwise, if other is an array type and the least common supertype lcs between its elements and the elements of this exists, an array type of lcs is returned;
        • Otherwise, if other is an array type, then Object is returned;
        • Otherwise, if other is a NilType or an UnusedType, then this is returned;
        • Otherwise, null is returned.
        Overrides:
        leastCommonSupertype in class Type
        Parameters:
        other - the type whose least supertype with this array type must be found
        Returns:
        the least common supertype of this array type and other, if it exists, or null otherwise (for instance, there is no least common supertype between int and an array of boolean)

      • toBCEL

        public org.apache.bcel.generic.Type toBCEL()
        Description copied from class: Type
        Translates a Kitten type into its BCEL equivalent.
        Specified by:
